column1: # Crop moisture fractions used when rescaling dry-matter yields to fresh mass.
# - crop: crop identifier used in configuration files
# - moisture_fraction: share of fresh mass that is water (0-1 range)
# - source: short citation for the value
# - note: optional clarification when a value was inferred

column4: Represents aggregated fruits and nuts entry
Matches 24% oil share cited by GAEZ
Assumed equal to generic fodder crops
